name: Energy Bites with Coconut and Cherries
description: These energy bites with coconut and cherries make such a great snack! They're super easy to make and perfect when you're craving something sweet but want to eat healthy!
recipeIngredient: more coconut flakes, to roll in

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients into a high speed blender or food processor and pulse until all ingredients are well combined. Usually you have to pulse about 6-8 times. You should get a very sticky mixture, which can easily be formed into little balls.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients into a high speed blender or food processor and pulse until all ingredients are well combined. Usually you have to pulse about 6-8 times. You should get a very sticky mixture, which can easily be formed into little balls.

recipeInstructions.text: Form the mixture into 18-20 energy balls. Put some coconut flakes on a plate and roll the energy bites in them. The energy balls can be stored in an air-tight container in the fridge for up to one week. Enjoy!
